cves.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Saysis Computer Systems Trade Ltd. Co. StarCities E-Municipality Management allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects StarCities E-Municipality Management: before 20250825.

affected.vendor: Saysis Computer Systems Trade Ltd. Co.

problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')
